question: Which of the following act had set provisions for Electoral Trusts under the Income Tax Act 1961?
explanation: The Finance Act of the year 2009 had set provisions for the Electoral Trusts under the Income Tax Act 1961. Section 13B of the Act provides that the companies and entities looking to provide funding to political parties can set up non-profit companies, which should mandatorily contain ‘Electoral Trust’ in their names.
